Articles.Content: I know this may seem random, but how often does a Kerbin>Eve>Moho transfer happen, taking into account a gravity assist from Eve? By Kerbin>Eve>Moho, I mean going from Kerbin, stopping at Eve for a flyby, and then arriving at Moho all in 1 burn.
You might find PLAD's excellent [Flyby Finder](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80978) very useful for planning such transfers.
